  • Method Details

    • getGameLogContents

      public ArrayList<String> getGameLogContents()
      Return the elements of the game log.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of String objects, where each element is one line in the log.

    • getGameLogContentsFiltered

      public ArrayList<String> getGameLogContentsFiltered(String inputQuery)
      Return the elements of the game log that match the given query.
      Parameters:
      inputQuery - The case-insensitive query for all elements in gameLogContents to be matched against.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of String objects, where each element is one line in the log, matching the given query parameter.

    • clearLogs

      public void clearLogs()

    • sendWelcomeMessage

      public void sendWelcomeMessage()
      Send a welcome message to the game log when the application is first launched.

    • appendToGameLog

      public void appendToGameLog(String input, int turnCounter)
      Append the input to the game log as a formatted line.
      Entries are prefixed with the current date and time, as well as the current turn number.
      Parameters:
      input - The contents of the message.
      turnCounter - The current turn.

    • appendToGameLog

      public void appendToGameLog(String input)
